ygData.subject: Re: WEAPONS for my PET
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/18/99 1:55:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... about ... skel ... Only give your pet rusty weapons, and then ONLY up to the 4th rank (12th
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/18/99 1:55:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
mata_eq@... writes:

> Has anyone given any swords or anything to your pets? I was thinking
about
> trying to save up for a Mino Axe if you can get the axe back after your
skel
> is killed. Otherwise I don't think I will use weapons. Or is it more
> damage??
>
> Any info on weapons for your pets would be GREAT! Thanks!


Only give your pet rusty weapons, and then ONLY up to the 4th rank (12th
level) pet.

#1 you cannot get back what you give the pet.

#2 a 12th level pet hits harder without a weapon.

#3 a 12th level pet can hit magical creatures... but as soon as you give it a
normal weapon... it cannot hit magical creatures...

Sonoroud.
